titles.title: A bill to impose sanctions with respect to certain militias in Iraq that are backed by the Government of Iran.
Iranian Proxies Terrorist Sanctions Act
Iranian Proxies Terrorist Sanctions Act
Iranian Proxies Terrorist Sanctions Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

term.name: Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents

bill.summary:
Iranian Proxies Terrorist Sanctions Act
This bill directs the President to block and prohibit all transactions in U.S. property and property interests of the As-Saib Ahl al-Haq and Harakat Hizballah al-Nujaba militias and any foreign person who is an official, agent, or affiliate of such groups.
